content: in this legal case a court in caltanissetta has made a final decision regarding the dissolution of a community property inheritance the plaintiffs who are the children of two deceased individuals are suing the second spouse of one of the deceased individuals they are requesting the allocation of a basement area the division of movable property described in their fathers will and a sum of money the defendant objects to the plaintiffs requests for the use of the property and furniture but requests the assignment of the real estate to them the court rejects some of the plaintiffs claims but determines that they are entitled to a portion of the real estate the furniture described in their fathers will and a share of the civil fruits produced by the property the court orders the dissolution of the community property and assigns the properties in san cataldo to the plaintiffs the plaintiffs are ordered to pay the defendant a sum of money for the use of the real estate and the defendant is ordered to pay a sum of money to the plaintiffs the costs of the proceedings are to be shared equally between the parties the court also mentions that the legal principles applied in this case are articles 720 of the civil code and 789 of the civil procedure code the decision was made on may 10 2017 in caltanissetta
